comment._content: NYT of October 18, 1914 had a lengthy and enthusiastic review of France's latest novel, Revolt of the Angels. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9903E3D6133DE333A... www.alibris.com/reviews/5741092 shows that it is still a good read. I'm tempted to give it a try.
